biotools.summary: MPEA is a rapid tool for functional analysis and biological interpretation of metabolic profiling data. In particular, MPEA is designed to be used with data generated by gas chromatography mass spectrometry (GCMS); one of the most prominent analytical methods for metabolic studies and able to quantify hundreds of small molecules from biological extracts in a single run.
